pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, June 2, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Friday, June 2, 2017:

Ottawa, Ontario

9:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the Federation of Canadian Municipalitiesâ€™ (FCM) Annual Conference.

Canada Hall 1
Shaw Centre
55 Colonel By Drive
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage for remarks
  • Media should arrive no later than 8:30 a.m.
  • For media accreditation, please contact media@fcm.ca

12:35 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Newfoundland and Labrador Premier Dwight Ball.

Centre Block, Office of the Prime Minister
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only

1:20 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with New Brunswick Premier Brian Gallant.

Centre Block, Office of the Prime Minister
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Note for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
